 [H3Start] tail suspension test and footprint analysis 
 [Paragraph] tests were performed as described ##18 . in the tail suspension test , mice were habit ##uated to the test room 1 hour prior to testing . mice were held by the tail for 15 seconds and clasp ##ing behavior was assessed . the clasp ##ing score was equal to 0 if no clasp ##ing was observed during the test time , 1 if abnormal extension of the hind ##lim ##bs was noticed , 2 if the mouse showed partial clasp ##ing , and 3 when the mouse displayed firmly established clasp ##ing . for footprint analysis , each paw of the mouse was dipped in a different color of edible paint and the mice were habit ##uated for one day to the testing chamber , a cardboard tunnel with a wide filter paper pad on the floor . on the test day , the footprint strips were collected , scanned and analyzed with image ##j software . analysis was performed only if mice were able to walk at least 3 steps without stopping . tests were scored by an experiment ##er blind to treatment conditions . 
 [H3Start] por ##sol ##t test 
 [Paragraph] the por ##sol ##t test was carried out as previously described ##29 . animals were forced to swim individually in a vertical 18 - cm glass cylinder , diameter 15 cm , and containing 13 . 5 cm of water maintained at ~ 25 °c . after 6 min in the water , they were removed and allowed to dry under a heating lamp for 10 minutes . the total duration of im ##mo ##bility was measured . an animal was judged to be im ##mobile whenever it remained floating in the water in a slightly hunched but upright posture , the head just above the water . 
 [H3Start] im ##mun ##oh ##isto ##chemist ##ry 
 [Paragraph] mice were pre - an ##est ##het ##ized with iso ##fl ##ura ##ne and an ##est ##het ##ized with ur ##eth ##ane at a dose of 2 g / kg . animals were trans ##card ##ial ##ly per ##fus ##ed with 20 ml / min [SEP]

 [Paragraph] air ##bn ##b is just a marketplace . you need to rely on the individual owners , not the site . i ’ ve used them and i ’ ve learned that every experience is different depending on the owner . some are nice and helpful . others are not . in china i would not touch an air ##bn ##b that won ’ t help you register . move on to the next one with a different owner . if they won ’ t help you with something this basic the unit ismail ##i likely to not be as nice as they claim and they certainly won ’ t help you if there ’ s any issues .
